title: gz help joint would need the units

content.raw:
When modifying a joint via GUI you can view and chose the units for different metrics but in the command line, the help does not provide information about which one is going to be used:

```
  --pos-t arg             Target angle.
  --pos-p arg             Position proportional gain.
  --pos-i arg             Position integral gain.
  --pos-d arg             Position differential gain.
  --vel-t arg             Target speed.
  --vel-p arg             Velocity proportional gain.
  --vel-i arg             Velocity integral gain.
  --vel-d arg             Velocity differential gain.
```
content.html:
When modifying a joint via GUI you can view and chose the units for different metrics but in the command line, the help does not provide information about which one is going to be used:

  --pos-t arg             Target angle.
  --pos-p arg             Position proportional gain.
  --pos-i arg             Position integral gain.
  --pos-d arg             Position differential gain.
  --vel-t arg             Target speed.
  --vel-p arg             Velocity proportional gain.
  --vel-i arg             Velocity integral gain.
  --vel-d arg             Velocity differential gain.
